title: Friday broker round-up
text:
53.64 +1.13 
LONDON (ShareCast) - (ShareCast News) - Aa: Berenberg Bank starts a new coverage with a buy, sets target price at 350.00p. Globaltrans Investment Gdr (reg S (Other OTC: UBGXF - news ) ): Credit Suisse (LSE: 0QP5.L - news ) upgrades to neutral, reduces target price to 4.20p. 
Connect Group (Other OTC: SMWPY - news ) : Berenberg Bank starts a new coverage with a buy, sets target price at 200.00p. 
Telecom Plus (LSE: TEP.L - news ) : Berenberg Bank starts a new coverage with a buy, sets target price at 1400.00p. 
Carillion (Other OTC: CIOIF - news ) : JP Morgan Cazenove upgrades to overweight, bumps down target price to 347.00p. 
Travis Perkins (LSE: TPK.L - news ) : Citigroup (NYSE: C - news ) upgrades to buy, sets target price at 2220.00p. 
Mothercare (LSE: MTC.L - news ) : Berenberg Bank starts a new coverage with a hold. Target (NYSE: TGT - news ) price:250.00p. 
Pearson (Xetra: 858266 - news ) : Exane BNP Paribas downgrades to neutral. Target price:1000.00p.
